channel.title: Inserting a media?
channel.description:
Ok so i know how to upload the movie at imageshack.us then i go to reply,
then i go to insert image and then i copy the link thing and past it inbetween it.
then it shows a little red x like below
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 1994, 02:23:19 am[/size][hr][img]http://img221.imageshack.us/my.php?image=myphpimageclip0332iy8tv1.flv[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2007, 08:54:48 PM[/size][hr]Do i need to download a better media player?
